#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std ;
int main () {
    int cnt = 0 , beg , m = -100000;
    string s ;
    getline(cin , s);
    int i = 0 ;
    int len = s.size();
    for ( i = 0 ; i < len ; i++ ) {
        //cout << i << endl;
        if ( s[i] == '(' ) {
            cnt++ ;
            if ( cnt > m ) {
                m = cnt ;
                beg = i+1 ;
            }
        }
        else if ( s[i] == ')' ) {
            cnt--;
        }
    }
    for ( int j = beg ; j < len ; j++ ) {
        if ( s[j] == ')' )
            break ;
        cout << s[j] ;
    }
    cout << endl;
    return 0 ;
}
